original_text:
They give water to all the beasts of the field;
    the wild donkeys quench their thirst.
korean_text: 각종 들짐승에게 마시게 하시니 들나귀들도 해갈하며

sentences.original_text: They give water to all the beasts of the field
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 들에 있는 모든 짐승에게 물을 줍니다

sentences.original_text: the wild donkeys quench their thirst
